product.shortDescription: Moonlight II Hardside Carry-On Spinner is perfect for a 1-3 day trip, this carry on has everything you need to make your quick getaway stress free and fun!

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?

product.headlineDescription:
Moonlight II has beautiful prints and gracefully precise details, this hardside carry on has everything you need.

  • Overall Dimensions: 22.0" x 15.0" x 9.5"
  • Weight: 7.17 lbs
